tvardefs.name: OWRITE_TMP_VAR
tvardefs.desc: Variable required by OWrite to use Omnis image conversion functions and evaluate tables

tvardefs.name: tvCanDoCustomExport
tvardefs.desc: if true, OWrite supports saving document as list data for custom exports (requires version 3.5.0) CHANGE_2013_11_27_1

tvardefs.name: tvCanDoOWriteWeb
tvardefs.desc: if true, OWrite web component is available

tvardefs.name: tvCanDoPDF
tvardefs.desc: if true, PDF component is available

tvardefs.name: tvCanDoSpell
tvardefs.desc: if true, OSpell component is available

tvardefs.name: tvFontmapIsV2
tvardefs.desc: if true, the loaded fontmap is pre-V3  ;; CHANGE_V3A12

tvardefs.name: tvIsUnicode
tvardefs.desc: if true, we are running unicode omnis

tvardefs.name: tvOSpellGlossary
tvardefs.desc: global glossary object, must only have only one of those CHANGE_2014_06_11__1

tvardefs.name: tvStudio4
tvardefs.desc: if true, we are running studio 4 or higher CHANGE_V3A8

tvardefs.name: tvStudio5
tvardefs.desc: if true, we are running stuido 5 or higher CHANGE_V3A8

tvardefs.name: tvStudio6
tvardefs.desc: if true, we are running studio 6 or higher CHANGE_2014_02_11__1
